title: Digital Game-Based Learning Course for Historical Exploration

context.additional_context: Utilization of digital games for history education linked to science-related job roles

learning_goals: Analyze causal relationships between historical events and figures through game simulations
Arrange at least five major historical events in chronological order by completing in-game quests
Evaluate historical decision-making processes with over 80% accuracy using feedback systems within digital games

resources: Responsive Web-Based DGBL (Digital Game-Based Learning) Software

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
